en.heading: Choose a new teacher for m_c
en.info:
If a trainee is 6 moons old and their teacher is changed, they will not be listed as a former trainee on their old teacher's profile. Trainees without a teacher will have one automatically assigned next moon. A trainee's teacher can have an influence on their trait and skill later in life.
Choose your teachers wisely.

current_mentor.zero: m_c does not have a teacher

en.no_current_apprentices_tooltip: Only show teachers with no current trainees
en.no_former_apprentices_tooltip: Only show teachers who have not had a trainee
